thread.section_title: Hotel Beaugency - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Holliday - Review
thread.title_full: Holliday - Review of Hotel Beaugency, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: iulian m
title: Holliday - Review
text:
It's a nice small hotel,close of the Eiffel Tower,close to metro station.Around nice places to eat,drink,buying fresh fruits,nice cozy shops.Friendly staff,good communication,fresh and tasty breakfast.The problems in most of hotels around Paris,small room,small lifts,but hey...you are here to travel!!The thinks i didn't like,separate toilet,small,like a prison,etch time open the door,you hit the entrance door.I didn't had shower gel in bathroom,I found an open soap,a towel on the floor inside shower like someone had shower before to.All one by one its ok,I truly recommended!
Merci!!
